name: ESPN: NBA 2K5 Online Trivia | Video Games | 10 Questions

	Sega exited the hardware business, and started making software in early 2000, after the Dreamcast failed to make a profit.

Ben Wallace & Wallace.

	Ben Wallace went undrafted out of college, but went on to win back to back NBA Defensive player of the year awards in 2002 and 2003.

questions.text: This game originally retailed for a price much different than most games debut at. What price did it debut at? (Round to the nearest dollar)
questions.explanation:
$20.

	To sell more copies, Sega began releasing all of its sports titles at $20 in 2004.

True.

	Every sports game that ESPN had ever released, as of 2004, has had an "E" or everybody rating.

questions.text: How many players can play in one game?
questions.explanation:
10.

	Up to 10 players can play together online. Up to four without an internet connection.

questions.text: Can this game be played online?
questions.explanation:
Yes.

	With the use of the broadband adapter this game can be played over the net allowing up to 10 players at a time to participate.

questions.text: How many different game modes can be played?
questions.explanation:
6.

	The modes are: Arcade, Simulation, The Assiociation(Franchise), pick-up, quick game and 24/7.

questions.text: This was the ________ ESPN basketball game on the PS2.
questions.explanation:
second.

	This was the second year that Sega has released an ESPN title on the PS2. Sega began releasing titles for other consoles after the Dreamcast failed to make them a profit. Sega had become the "worldwide leader in sports" video games, to borrow the phrase from ESPN.

questions.text: I have a pair of starting players on my team that share a last name. What team do I use in franchise mode?
questions.explanation:
Detroit Pistons & Pistons & Detroit.

	The defending NBA champion Detroit Pistons had both Ben & Rasheed Wallace in the starting line-up for most of the season.

questions.text: What feature that debuted with "NBA 2K4" is exclusive to the ESPN franchise?
questions.explanation:
Isomotion.

	Isomotion allows the player to control the dribbling pattern of the offensive player with the ball, and is an exclusive feature to the "NBA 2K" series. Thanks for taking my quiz.
